name: Farther Reaches
description:
A short game about gazing at stars and making up constellations with a friend. About

It is a warm summer night. Two women sit on a rooftop, gazing at the stars.
Learn about them and the world they inhabit by listening to their stories and drawing new constellations into the night sky.

Features
  • Soak up the atmosphere of a warm, clear summer night
  • Get immersed in the mythology of this familiar, yet strange world
  • Freely draw your own constellations
  • Assign a meaning to constellations drawn by your friend
Credits

A game by Arno Justus
Made in 5 days for the Stray Fawn Studio internal game jam
Music: "Farther Reaches"  by Fog Lake

Thank you for playing!
